leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 物理-控制/反问题/最优化生态
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 优化/推断库 + 可微分框架

queries: [WEB] automatic differentiation libraries for physics github

tools.name: taichi.js
tools.one_line_profile: Modern GPU Compute and Rendering in Javascript
tools.detailed_description: A Javascript library that enables modern GPU compute and rendering capabilities in the browser, porting the Taichi programming language features for high-performance physics simulation and visualization.

tools.name: rscope
tools.one_line_profile: RL training visualizer for Mujoco Playground and Brax
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool designed for monitoring and analyzing reinforcement learning training processes in physics-based environments like Mujoco Playground and Brax.

tools.name: XLB
tools.one_line_profile: Accelerated Lattice Boltzmann for Physics-based ML
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable fluid dynamics simulator based on the Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM), designed for physics-based machine learning applications and accelerated on GPUs.

tools.name: DawDreamer
tools.one_line_profile: Digital Audio Workstation with Python and JAX support
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based Digital Audio Workstation (DAW) library that supports VST instruments, FAUST, and JAX, enabling differentiable audio signal processing and synthesis.

tools.name: evox
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed GPU-Accelerated Framework for Evolutionary Computation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for evolutionary computation that leverages JAX for GPU acceleration and distributed computing, providing a wide range of evolutionary algorithms and benchmark problems.

tools.name: metade
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated evolutionary framework for Differential Evolution
tools.detailed_description: A GPU-accelerated framework optimizing Differential Evolution (DE) strategies via meta-level evolution, supporting both JAX and PyTorch for large-scale black-box optimization.

tools.name: tensorneat
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated NeuroEvolution of Augmenting Topologies (NEAT)
tools.detailed_description: A JAX-based implementation of the NEAT (NeuroEvolution of Augmenting Topologies) algorithm, enabling efficient GPU-accelerated neuroevolution.

tools.name: tensorrvea
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated Evolutionary Multiobjective Optimization Using Tensorized RVEA
tools.detailed_description: A GPU-accelerated library for evolutionary multiobjective optimization using a tensorized Reference Vector Guided Evolutionary Algorithm (RVEA).

tools.name: NeRF-NCNN
tools.one_line_profile: NeRF implementation in NCNN with C++ & Vulkan
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance implementation of Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF) using the NCNN framework with C++ and Vulkan support for efficient inference and rendering.

tools.name: AdaPT
tools.one_line_profile: Physically based mesh renderer based on Taichi
tools.detailed_description: A physically based path tracer (renderer) implemented using the Taichi programming language, supporting differentiable rendering workflows.

tools.name: Kinetix
tools.one_line_profile: Reinforcement learning on general 2D physics environments in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A library for reinforcement learning research in general 2D physics environments, implemented in JAX for high performance and differentiability.

tools.name: DiffTactile
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-based Differentiable Tactile Simulator
tools.detailed_description: A physics-based differentiable tactile simulator designed for contact-rich robotic manipulation tasks, enabling gradient-based optimization for tactile sensing.

tools.name: Genesis
tools.one_line_profile: Generative world for general-purpose robotics & embodied AI
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive simulation platform for general-purpose robotics and embodied AI learning, providing a generative world environment for training and testing agents.

tools.name: ThinShellLab
tools.one_line_profile: Thin-shell Object Manipulations with Differentiable Physics Simulations
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable physics simulation environment specifically designed for manipulating thin-shell objects, useful for robotic manipulation research.

tools.name: RayTracingPBR
tools.one_line_profile: Simple PBR Path Tracing Renderer
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Physically Based Rendering (PBR) path tracer, useful for educational purposes and basic rendering tasks in physics-based graphics.

tools.name: optiland
tools.one_line_profile: Optical design and optimization with differentiable ray tracing
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python package for optical design, analysis, and optimization, featuring GPU-accelerated and differentiable ray tracing capabilities via PyTorch.

tools.name: JaxLayerLumos
tools.one_line_profile: JAX-based Differentiable Optical and RF Simulator
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable simulator for multilayer optical and radio frequency structures, implemented in JAX to enable gradient-based optimization of material properties and geometries.

tools.name: jaxrenderer
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable Rasteriser implemented in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable rasterization engine implemented in JAX, allowing for gradient-based optimization of 3D scenes and rendering parameters.

tools.name: taichi-ngp-renderer
tools.one_line_profile: Instant-NGP renderer implemented using Taichi
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Instant-NGP (Neural Graphics Primitives) renderer using the Taichi programming language, facilitating high-performance neural rendering.

tools.name: pytorch-softdtw-cuda
tools.one_line_profile: Fast CUDA implementation of differentiable soft DTW for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance, CUDA-accelerated implementation of Soft Dynamic Time Warping (DTW) for PyTorch, enabling differentiable time series analysis and alignment.

tools.name: pycharge
tools.one_line_profile: Electromagnetics simulation library for moving point charges in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A JAX-based simulation library for calculating electromagnetic fields generated by moving point charges, supporting automatic differentiation.

tools.name: torchoptics
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable wave optics simulation library built on PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library for simulating wave optics, enabling differentiable modeling of optical systems and wave propagation.

tools.name: Jax2D
tools.one_line_profile: Highly scalable 2D JAX physics engine
tools.detailed_description: A scalable 2D physics engine implemented in JAX, designed for high-performance simulation and differentiable physics applications.

tools.name: NVIDIA Warp
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance Python framework for differentiable simulation and spatial computing
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework designed for high-performance simulation, data generation, and spatial computing. It allows writing differentiable graphics and simulation kernels in Python that compile to efficient C++/CUDA code.

tools.name: DiSECt
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable simulator for cutting soft materials
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable simulation framework specifically designed for the cutting of soft materials. It utilizes the Finite Element Method (FEM) and supports gradient-based optimization for control and parameter inference in robotic manipulation tasks.

tools.name: feax
tools.one_line_profile: JAX-based compact finite element analysis (FEA) engine
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance, differentiable Finite Element Analysis (FEA) engine built on top of JAX. It enables gradient-based optimization of physical structures and supports hardware acceleration on GPUs/TPUs.

tools.name: DPFEHM
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable subsurface flow simulator for porous media
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable simulator for modeling subsurface flow and transport in porous media. It is designed for inverse modeling and parameter estimation in geological and hydrological studies using Julia's automatic differentiation capabilities.

tools.name: beamz
tools.one_line_profile: Electromagnetic simulation and inverse design tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for fast electromagnetic simulation and inverse design. It aims to provide an easy-to-use interface for wave propagation modeling and optimization.

tools.name: torch-diffsim
tools.one_line_profile: Minimal parallelizable differentiable physics simulator in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight, differentiable physics simulator implemented entirely in PyTorch. It supports parallel simulation of rigid body dynamics and is designed for reinforcement learning and control tasks requiring gradient information.

tools.name: Aquarium.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable fluid-structure interaction solver for robotics
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable solver for Fluid-Structure Interaction (FSI) problems, specifically tailored for robotics applications. It allows for gradient-based optimization of robot designs and control policies in fluid environments.

tools.name: DiffEqPhysics.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed differential equation modeling library
tools.detailed_description: A library within the SciML ecosystem for building differential equations from physical principles (e.g., Hamiltonians, Lagrangians). It integrates with the broader Julia differential equation solvers for scientific machine learning applications.

tools.name: NBodySimulator.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable N-body simulator for astrophysics and molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable simulator for N-body problems, suitable for applications in astrophysics and molecular dynamics. It supports various interaction potentials and integrators, enabling gradient-based analysis and parameter estimation.

tools.name: Simple Simulator
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance physics simulator for robotics and control
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight and fast physics simulator designed for robotics research. It provides a simple API for simulating rigid body dynamics and is optimized for reinforcement learning and control tasks.

tools.name: Diff-Hybrid-Traffic-Sim
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable hybrid traffic simulator for macroscopic and microscopic modeling
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable traffic simulator that combines macroscopic and microscopic modeling approaches. It allows for gradient-based optimization of traffic flow and control parameters, useful for transportation science and urban planning.

tools.name: MuJoCo-LiDAR
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance LiDAR simulation extension for MuJoCo
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance LiDAR simulation tool integrated with the MuJoCo physics engine. It supports multiple backends (CPU, Taichi, Jax) and ROS integration, enabling realistic sensor simulation for robotics research.

tools.name: FMI.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia library for Functional Mock-up Interface (FMI) simulation and differentiation
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for working with the Functional Mock-up Interface (FMI) standard. It allows users to load, simulate, and differentiate Functional Mock-up Units (FMUs), facilitating the integration of diverse simulation models into scientific machine learning workflows.

tools.name: skrl
tools.one_line_profile: Modular reinforcement learning library supporting differentiable physics engines
tools.detailed_description: A modular Reinforcement Learning (RL) library designed to work seamlessly with differentiable physics engines like NVIDIA Warp, Isaac Lab, and Brax. It provides optimized implementations of RL algorithms for physics-based control tasks.

tools.name: GeoTaichi
tools.one_line_profile: Taichi-based numerical simulator for geophysical problems
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance numerical simulator built with Taichi, designed for solving multiscale and multifield geophysical problems. It leverages GPU acceleration for efficient simulation of complex geological processes.

tools.name: jaxsim
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable multibody dynamics physics engine in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable physics engine and multibody dynamics library implemented in JAX. It is designed for robot learning and control applications, enabling efficient gradient computation through physics simulations.

tools.name: Blackbirds
tools.one_line_profile: Black-box inference framework for differentiable simulators
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to perform black-box inference on differentiable simulators, enabling parameter estimation and model calibration in scientific simulations.

tools.name: Differometor
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable interferometer simulator for gravitational wave detector design
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable simulation tool specifically designed for the computational design and optimization of gravitational wave detectors using interferometry.

tools.name: xad-py
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance automatic differentiation library for Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python binding for the XAD automatic differentiation library, providing high-performance gradient computation for scientific computing applications.

tools.name: pinnfactory
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight framework for building Physics-Informed Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A framework for constructing Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) using symbolic PDE definitions with SymPy and automatic differentiation in PyTorch.

tools.name: FBPINNs
tools.one_line_profile: Finite Basis Physics-Informed Neural Networks solver
tools.detailed_description: A library to solve forward and inverse problems related to partial differential equations using finite basis physics-informed neural networks (FBPINNs), improving scalability and accuracy.

tools.name: Differentiable Rigid Body Simulator
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable rigid body physics simulator
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable rigid body simulator developed for PhyRecon, enabling physical parameter estimation and reconstruction through gradient-based optimization.

tools.name: SciBmad.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable accelerator physics library in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A modular, polymorphic, and differentiable accelerator physics code compatible with CPU and GPU, designed for modeling particle accelerators.

tools.name: jax-gcm
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable General Circulation Model in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A General Circulation Model (GCM) for climate physics implemented in JAX, enabling differentiable climate simulations and optimization.

tools.name: mdmm-jax
tools.one_line_profile: Gradient-based constrained optimization library for JAX
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Modified Differential Multiplier Method (MDMM) for JAX, enabling gradient-based constrained optimization for scientific problems.

tools.name: FusionForce
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable physics engine for robot-terrain interaction
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable physics engine designed to predict robot-terrain interactions by fusing RGB and LiDAR data, useful for robotics and physical simulation.

tools.name: MonoForce
tools.one_line_profile: Learnable image-conditioned physics engine
tools.detailed_description: A learnable physics engine that predicts physical interactions from image data, applicable to robot navigation and terrain analysis.

tools.name: evoxels
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable physics framework for voxel-based simulations
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable physics framework tailored for voxel-based microstructure simulations, enabling optimization of material properties and structures.

tools.name: NEMO
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable simulator for protein structure learning
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable simulator designed for learning and predicting protein structures, integrating physics-based simulation with machine learning.

tools.name: JAX-FEM
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable Finite Element Method library using JAX
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for performing differentiable Finite Element Method (FEM) simulations using JAX, suitable for structural mechanics, heat transfer, and other physical systems.

tools.name: mitransient
tools.one_line_profile: Transient rendering library for Mitsuba 3
tools.detailed_description: A library for non-line-of-sight transient rendering implemented in Mitsuba 3, enabling simulation of light transport for advanced imaging applications.

tools.name: Dojo.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable physics engine for robotics in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable physics engine written in Julia, designed for robotics simulation, control, and trajectory optimization.

tools.name: correctionlib-gradients
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic differentiation for HEP correction factors
tools.detailed_description: A tool providing automatic differentiation capabilities for high-energy physics correction factor calculations, extending the correctionlib ecosystem.

tools.name: SPH_Taichi
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance SPH solver in Taichi
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance implementation of Smoothed Particle Hydrodynamics (SPH) using the Taichi programming language, suitable for fluid simulation.

tools.name: Tiny Differentiable Simulator
tools.one_line_profile: Header-only C++/CUDA differentiable physics library
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight, zero-dependency, header-only C++ and CUDA differentiable physics library designed for reinforcement learning and robotics.

tools.name: Stork
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable spiking neural network simulator
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable simulator for spiking neural networks (SNNs) designed to optimize SNN parameters via gradient descent, facilitating research in neuromorphic computing and computational neuroscience.

tools.name: MuJoCo Warp
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-optimized MuJoCo physics simulator via NVIDIA Warp
tools.detailed_description: A GPU-optimized version of the MuJoCo physics simulator, leveraging NVIDIA Warp to enable massive parallel simulation for robotics and reinforcement learning research.

tools.name: Brax
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable physics engine for massive parallel simulation
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable physics engine designed for massive parallel rigid body simulation on hardware accelerators (TPU/GPU), widely used for reinforcement learning and robotics research.

tools.name: JAX-CFD
tools.one_line_profile: Computational Fluid Dynamics in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A library for computational fluid dynamics (CFD) written in JAX, enabling differentiable fluid simulations and seamless integration with machine learning workflows.

tools.name: Taichi FVM2D
tools.one_line_profile: 2D Finite-Volume-Method compressible fluid solver
tools.detailed_description: A 2-dimensional compressible fluid solver implementing the Finite Volume Method (FVM) using Taichi, serving as a lightweight tool for fluid dynamics simulation.

tools.name: LBM Taichi
tools.one_line_profile: Lattice Boltzmann Method fluid solver in Taichi
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance fluid solver based on the Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM) implemented in Taichi, enabling efficient fluid simulation on GPUs.

tools.name: PlasticineLab
tools.one_line_profile: Soft-Body Manipulation Benchmark with Differentiable Physics
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for soft-body manipulation tasks powered by a differentiable physics engine, enabling research in gradient-based policy learning and system identification.

tools.name: Stannum
tools.one_line_profile: Bridge for fusing Taichi into PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A library that integrates Taichi's high-performance kernels into PyTorch's autograd graph, enabling end-to-end differentiable programming for physics-based deep learning.

tools.name: TorchDriveSim
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable traffic simulator in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight, differentiable traffic simulator built on PyTorch, designed for autonomous driving research and agent behavior modeling.

tools.name: JAX-MD
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable, Hardware Accelerated Molecular Dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A framework for differentiable and hardware-accelerated molecular dynamics simulations in JAX, enabling gradient-based optimization of potentials and structures.

tools.name: Jaxley
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable neuron simulations with biophysical detail
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable simulator for biophysically detailed neuron models, enabling gradient-based parameter estimation and optimization in computational neuroscience.

tools.name: ADCME.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic Differentiation for Computational Engineering
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for automatic differentiation in computational engineering, specifically designed for solving inverse problems involving partial differential equations (PDEs).

tools.name: lcp-physics
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable LCP physics engine in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable physics engine based on Linear Complementarity Problems (LCP), implemented in PyTorch to support gradient-based learning in rigid body dynamics.

tools.name: DeepXDE
tools.one_line_profile: Library for scientific machine learning and physics-informed learning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for scientific machine learning, offering support for Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs), DeepONets, and other methods to solve differential equations.

tools.name: CMBLensing.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable toolkit for CMB lensing analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Julia toolkit for analysis of Cosmic Microwave Background (CMB) lensing, featuring automatic differentiation and GPU acceleration for cosmological inference.

tools.name: deltaflow
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated differentiable fluid simulator in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable fluid simulator leveraging JAX for GPU acceleration, designed for physics-based machine learning and optimization tasks involving fluid dynamics.

tools.name: spin-model-transformers
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-inspired transformer modules for vector-spin models
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing transformer modules based on mean-field dynamics of vector-spin models, enabling physics-informed deep learning architectures.

tools.name: tunax
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic calibration of vertical ocean physics in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the automatic calibration of vertical ocean physics parameters using JAX's automatic differentiation capabilities, developed by the MEOM group.

tools.name: jinns
tools.one_line_profile: Physics Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) framework in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive JAX-based library for Physics Informed Neural Networks (PINNs), supporting SPINNs, HyperPINNs, and adaptive loss weights for solving differential equations.

tools.name: SoftMAC
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable soft body simulation with forecast-based contact
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable simulator for soft bodies featuring a forecast-based contact model and two-way coupling with articulated rigid bodies and clothes.

tools.name: Mitsuba 3
tools.one_line_profile: Retargetable forward and inverse renderer
tools.detailed_description: A research-oriented rendering system that supports forward and inverse rendering, widely used for differentiable rendering and light transport simulation.

tools.name: FEMcy
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel finite element solver based on Taichi
tools.detailed_description: A portable and parallel finite element method (FEM) solver implemented in Taichi, supporting CPU and GPU execution for physical simulations.

tools.name: Polycrystal-PhaseField
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-phase field simulation for grain growth in polycrystals
tools.detailed_description: A simulation tool for grain growth in polycrystals using a multi-phase field model, implemented in Taichi for cross-platform parallel computing.

tools.name: hamilton
tools.one_line_profile: Hamiltonian mechanics simulation with automatic differentiation
tools.detailed_description: A library to simulate physics on generalized coordinate systems using Hamiltonian Mechanics and automatic differentiation.

tools.name: mjlab
tools.one_line_profile: Isaac Lab API powered by MuJoCo-Warp for robotics research
tools.detailed_description: A library for reinforcement learning and robotics research, leveraging MuJoCo-Warp for efficient simulation and the Isaac Lab API.

tools.name: mdapy
tools.one_line_profile: Library for handling molecular dynamics simulation data
tools.detailed_description: A fast Python library designed to handle and analyze data generated from molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: DIMOS
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable Molecular Simulator
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based framework for machine-learning enhanced molecular simulations, enabling differentiable molecular dynamics.

tools.name: newton
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated physics simulation engine on NVIDIA Warp
tools.detailed_description: An open-source, GPU-accelerated physics simulation engine built upon NVIDIA Warp, specifically targeting roboticists and simulation researchers.

tools.name: DiffCloth
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable cloth simulation with dry frictional contact
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable cloth simulator that handles dry frictional contact, enabling gradient-based optimization for cloth dynamics.

tools.name: Brax Viewer
tools.one_line_profile: Web viewer for monitoring Brax RL policies
tools.detailed_description: A real-time, interactive web viewer for monitoring reinforcement learning policies trained with Brax, facilitating visualization of physics simulations.

tools.name: xpag
tools.one_line_profile: Modular reinforcement learning library with JAX agents
tools.detailed_description: A modular reinforcement learning library featuring JAX-based agents, designed for flexibility in research and experimentation.

tools.name: dtw
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic Time Warping (DTW) Python module
tools.detailed_description: A Python module for Dynamic Time Warping, a technique used for measuring similarity between two temporal sequences, widely used in scientific data analysis.

tools.name: VMAS
tools.one_line_profile: Vectorized Multi-Agent Simulator
tools.detailed_description: A vectorized differentiable simulator designed for efficient Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning (MARL) benchmarking, featuring a 2D physics engine in PyTorch.

tools.name: pypose
tools.one_line_profile: Library for differentiable robotics on manifolds
tools.detailed_description: A library for differentiable robotics that connects deep learning with physics-based optimization on manifolds, facilitating robot control and estimation.

tools.name: pyasflip
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of the ASFLIP advection method
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the ASFLIP (Affine Particle-In-Cell) advection method for fluid simulation.

tools.name: pinns-jax
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed Neural Networks (PINNs) in JAX
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Physics-informed Neural Networks (PINNs) using JAX, providing a framework for solving forward and inverse problems involving PDEs.

tools.name: deltapv
tools.one_line_profile: Photovoltaic simulator with automatic differentiation
tools.detailed_description: A photovoltaic simulator that utilizes automatic differentiation to enable gradient-based optimization of solar cell designs.

tools.name: pancax
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for Physics Informed Neural Networks in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools developed by Sandia National Laboratories for developing new methods and techniques in physics-informed neural networks (PINNs) using JAX.

tools.name: blender-mantaflow
tools.one_line_profile: Mantaflow integration in Blender
tools.detailed_description: Integration of the Mantaflow fluid simulation framework into Blender, enabling advanced fluid dynamics visualization and simulation.

tools.name: DeepLens
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable optical lens simulator for end-to-end camera design
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable optical lens simulator designed for end-to-end camera optimization, enabling the joint optimization of optical lens parameters and image processing algorithms.

tools.name: Jutul.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Fully-differentiable multi-physics finite-volume simulator
tools.detailed_description: A highly performant and fully differentiable simulator for multi-physics problems, utilizing finite-volume methods. It is designed for reservoir simulation and other porous media flow problems, supporting automatic differentiation for optimization and inverse problems.

tools.name: Taichi
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance parallel programming language for differentiable physics and graphics
tools.detailed_description: A domain-specific language embedded in Python that delivers high-performance, portable, and parallel GPU programming. It is widely used for differentiable physical simulation, computer graphics, and scientific computing.

tools.name: taichi.js
tools.one_line_profile: WebAssembly runtime for running Taichi kernels in JavaScript
tools.detailed_description: A library that allows developers to run compiled Taichi kernels in web browsers using JavaScript and WebAssembly, enabling web-based scientific visualization and simulation.

tools.name: Taichi Blend
tools.one_line_profile: Blender integration for Taichi-based physics simulation
tools.detailed_description: An integration tool that bridges Taichi's physics simulation capabilities with Blender, allowing users to create and render complex physics animations within the Blender environment.

tools.name: Taichi Elements
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance multi-material continuum physics engine
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance physics engine written in Taichi, focusing on multi-material continuum physics simulation using the Material Point Method (MPM).

tools.name: Taichi GLSL
tools.one_line_profile: Extension library for Taichi providing GLSL-like math functions
tools.detailed_description: A utility library for Taichi that provides a set of GLSL-alike helper functions and math utilities, facilitating the development of graphics and physics simulations.

tools.name: Taichi Three
tools.one_line_profile: Soft renderer based on Taichi for 3D visualization
tools.detailed_description: A soft rendering library built on Taichi, designed to provide 3D visualization capabilities for physics simulations and other graphical applications directly within the Taichi ecosystem.

tools.name: Duckietown.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable simulator for the Duckietown robotics platform
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable simulator for the Duckietown self-driving car platform, written in Julia. It enables differentiable physics simulations for robotics control and reinforcement learning research.

tools.name: RoboDojo.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable simulator for robotic systems physics
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable physics simulator for robotic systems, designed to support research in control, planning, and learning for robotics using Julia.

tools.name: Mantaflow
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source framework for fluid simulation research
tools.detailed_description: An open-source framework targeted at fluid simulation research in Computer Graphics and Machine Learning. It provides a versatile environment for developing and testing fluid algorithms.

tools.name: mdgrad
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable molecular dynamics engine in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable molecular dynamics (MD) engine implemented in PyTorch, allowing for the differentiation of MD trajectories with respect to force field parameters or initial conditions.

tools.name: PhiFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable PDE solving framework for machine learning and physics
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable PDE solving framework designed for machine learning applications. It provides a unified interface for solving partial differential equations with automatic differentiation support.

tools.name: ApeBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for autoregressive neural emulation of PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite designed for evaluating autoregressive neural emulators of Partial Differential Equations (PDEs). It includes datasets, metrics, and baseline implementations for differentiable physics research.

tools.name: JAXFLUIDS
tools.one_line_profile: Fully differentiable fluid dynamics solver in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A fully differentiable computational fluid dynamics (CFD) package written in JAX. It supports compressible flow simulations and is designed for optimization and machine learning integration.

tools.name: jaxdf
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for differentiable numerical simulators with arbitrary discretizations
tools.detailed_description: A JAX-based research framework for writing differentiable numerical simulators. It supports arbitrary discretizations and is aimed at facilitating research in differentiable physics and inverse problems.

tools.name: TaichiMD
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated molecular dynamics engine using Taichi
tools.detailed_description: An interactive, GPU-accelerated Molecular Dynamics (MD) simulation engine implemented using the Taichi programming language, designed for performance and ease of development.

tools.name: dtaidistance
tools.one_line_profile: Fast implementation of Dynamic Time Warping for time series analysis
tools.detailed_description: A library for time series distance computation, specifically offering a fast implementation of Dynamic Time Warping (DTW). It is widely used for time series alignment and analysis in scientific data processing.

tools.name: TaichiSLAM
tools.one_line_profile: 3D dense mapping backend library for SLAM based on Taichi
tools.detailed_description: A 3D Dense mapping backend library of SLAM (Simultaneous Localization and Mapping) implemented in Taichi, designed for aerial swarms and efficient differentiable geometric reconstruction.

tools.name: taichi_LBM3D
tools.one_line_profile: 3D sparse Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM) fluid solver
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance 3D sparse LBM solver implemented using Taichi, suitable for computational fluid dynamics (CFD) simulations.

tools.name: PBD_Taichi
tools.one_line_profile: Position Based Dynamics (PBD) physics engine implementation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of PBD and XPBD (Extended Position Based Dynamics) in Taichi, supporting various constraints for mesh and tetrahedron simulation.

tools.name: ChainQueen
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable MPM Simulator for physical control
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable Material Point Method (MPM) simulator designed for gradient-based optimization in physics control tasks and soft robotics.

tools.name: taichi_mpm
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance MLS-MPM solver
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance Moving Least Squares Material Point Method (MLS-MPM) solver for continuum mechanics simulation, as presented in SIGGRAPH 2018.

tools.name: taichi-TopOpt
tools.one_line_profile: Topology optimization framework using Taichi
tools.detailed_description: A topology optimization framework written in Taichi, enabling efficient structural optimization and design generation.
